title: Pesach: With Bina, Benny and Chaggai Hayonah
description: Join Bina, Benny and their winged friend, Chaggai the holiday dove, in these fun-filled adventures explainingthe background and observance of Pesach. From the award-winning Children's Holiday Series by Yaffa Ganz; illustrated in full color by Liat Benyaminy Ariel.
author: Yaffa Ganz
